original_text: When the news came to Joab—for Joab had supported Adonijah although he had not supported Absalom—Joab fled to the tent of the Lord and caught hold of the horns of the altar.
korean_text: 그 소문이 요압에게 들리매 그가 여호와의 장막으로 도망하여 제단 뿔을 잡으니 이는 그가 다윗을 떠나 압살롬을 따르지 아니하였으나 아도니야를 따랐음이더라

sentences.original_text: When the news came to Joab
although he had not supported Absalom
Joab fled to the tent of the Lord
and caught hold of the horns of the altar.
